'''''The Dark Powers of Tolkien''''' is a book written by [[David Day]], published in [[2018]].

It is the fifth installment of "The World of Tolkien" set.

==From the publisher==
{{Blockquote|The vast fictional universe of J.R.R. Tolkien contains many dark terrors to challenge the forces of good. This compendium of villains includes battle timelines, genealogy charts for creature races, striking illustrations, and well-researched commentary on the evil forces that dwell in Middle-earth. The unique, heat-burnished cover design and handy size make it a conversation starter as well as a great read.}}
